title: MLBucket List
author: Nadia Bahrami, Shelly Yusuf, Paul Sheridan, Kate Zurlo-Cuva
body: A website developed as part of a 5-day sprint with three other students that utilizes the Google API to chart a path to visit as many Major League Baseball stadiums as you wish in a season. The project also logs user data that persists locally.

title: My portfolio
author: Kate Zurlo-Cuva
body: An ongoing personal learning project that utilizes Handlebars, WebDB, JSON, page.js Middleware, and represents my first stab at following a Model-View-Controller format.

title: Salmon Cookies
author: Kate Zurlo-cuva
body: My first deployed Web site: An exercise in client-based project development that utilizes CSS animation as well as an internal client site using JS math functions, forms, and user events.
